Chapter 1.name: Wiseman
Chapter 1.content: Young man, your father sacrificed himself to protect our homeland...

Chapter 1.name: Sun
Chapter 1.content: How can I find the Wolf Warrior and fulfill my revenge?

Chapter 1.name: Wiseman
Chapter 1.content: well, all I need is Saussure Involucrate where you can find it at

Chapter 2-1.name: Goblin
Chapter 2-1.content: Here comes my trophy today! I will water the elderwood with your blood! It must be delicious!

Chapter 2-1.name: Sun
Chapter 2-1.content: Not today! I will take you down and get what I want!

Chapter 2-2.name: Slime
Chapter 2-2.content: Seems like you have taken down my Goblin! Today I will use your head to pay homage to him.

Chapter 2-2.name: Sun
Chapter 2-2.content: The last person who said this is already dead!

Chapter 2-3.name: Wiseman
Chapter 2-3.content: I knew you could get it!

Chapter 2-3.name: Sun
Chapter 2-3.content: Don't waste my time, tell me where he is.

Chapter 2-3.name: Wise
Chapter 2-3.content: well, that is kind of rude, youngblood. The Wolf Warrior is in the dungeon of Abstract mountain. Just be prepared that you cannot come back.

Chapter 3.name: Sun
Chapter 3.content: Finally, I can avenge my father by myselfâ€¦

Chapter 3.name: Wolf Warrior
Chapter 3.content: just another corpse to be buried with your father!
